title: New: Leisure – Plastic Soul
content: Having written one of my favourite tracks of last year in the form of the intoxicatingly beautiful Green Light, I’m thrilled to hear more from Massachusetts based duo Leisure. With their debut album now almost two years in the making, they’ve finally set a release date of 18 June for the eight track release entitled Plastic Soul. This new cut and title track from the record is a wonderfully languid pop number, bewitchingly befitting to today’s glorious weather. Leisure wear their 60’s inspirations on their sleeves, whilst the vocals of lead singer Jed Rouhana have a to-die-for charisma not too dissimilar to Pulp frontman Jarvis Cocker. Check out Plastic Soul below and head over to their website for more information.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
